description:
A man gets a bathtub stuck to his butt by an angry god. A warrior challenges the ghosts of Himeji castle.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ohendo-san to Ofuro / Himeji Jou no Mononoke Taiji
The Pilgrim and the Bath / The Slaying of the Monster of Himeji Castle
おへんどさんとおふろ / 姫路城のもののけ退治
